title: Orca Nami
body: Since i started playing league i fell in love with Nami and i started thinking about skin ideas for her and what i got is Orca Nami i think it will be the best skin for her and so cute! I think everyone will love it. If u don't know what a Orca is it is also called a Killer Whale so imagine Nami's tail as a killer whales Tail and her back is where the fin is so on and so forth. So tell me what you guys think about it :D <3 hope u guys like my idea.

replies.body:
You mean Tundra Nami? Im way ahead of you.
http://zamroyz.deviantart.com/art/Nami-Tundra-Skin-Idea-424201679
I've been posting this for years and i swear people just aren't interested at all. If not enough of them. It was a real shame and i just gave up. I feel like it'll never happen.
i think it will some day happen since they made tundra fizz. maybe they will make tundra Nami it fits perfectly with her i see why not. Man riot please make this skin for nami <333 >.<

Damn, I'm already a fan of this and I haven't even seen art ye--

...Never mind that last part. Give it to us, Riot!!
